dnsIps.description: A list of up to three IP addresses of DNS servers or domain controllers in the self-managed AD directory.

domainName.description: The fully qualified domain name of the self-managed AD directory.

fileSystemAdministratorsGroup.description: The name of the domain group whose members have administrative privileges for the FSx file system.

organizationalUnitDistinguishedName.description: The fully qualified distinguished name of the organizational unit within the self-managed AD directory to which the Windows File Server or ONTAP storage virtual machine (SVM) instance is joined.

username.description: The user name for the service account on your self-managed AD domain that FSx uses to join to your AD domain.
